tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BacteriaGeneticSequences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strain_name VARCHAR(255),
    genetic_sequence TEXT,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ResearcherCatalog (
    ResearcherID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ResearcherName VARCHAR(50),
    StrainID INT,
    DateCataloged DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (StrainID) REFERENCES BacteriaStrains(StrainID)
);

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    bacteria_id INT,
    experiment_date DATE,
    result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (bacteria_id) REFERENCES BacteriaStrains(bacteria_id)
);

CREATE TABLE bacteria (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
sequence TEXT NOT NULL,
strain VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
institution VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE experiments (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
researcher_id INT NOT NULL,
bacteria_id INT NOT NULL,
start_date DATE NOT NULL,
end_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE results (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
experiment_id INT NOT NULL,
result_text TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE comparisons (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
result_id_1 INT NOT NULL,
result_id_2 INT NOT NULL,
similarity_score FLOAT NOT NULL
)
